import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import { InputGroup, FormControl, Container, Row, Image, Button, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Login.css"; import { FaEnvelope, FaLock } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import * as yup from 'yup'; const schema = yup.object({ email: yup.string().required, password: yup.string().required, }); function FormExample() { return ( {({ handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, values, touched, isValid, errors, }) => (
First name Looks good! Last name Looks good! Username @ {errors.username} City {errors.city} State {errors.state} Zip {errors.zip}
)} ); } class Login extends Component { render() { return (
or Sign up here!
); } } export default Login;
